Title: "Reality's Jester"

A jester in the guise of truth, Carmichael,
Unflinching under evasive spotlight,
Confronts trauma's jagged teeth with laughter's shield.
Encourages journeys through childhood's hidden crevices,
His friend Jamar, a reluctant pilgrim.
Homecoming's awkward dance, a devout mother meets 
The unfamiliar rhythm of comedy's brave face.
Promises of discomfort remarkable, tonight we watch,
On screens that reflect, we are all jesters of reality.
